recipes.cookingMethod: Preheat the oven to 200C. Roll out the puff pastry, place the beef on top, cover with a mixture of mushrooms, prosciutto, and mustard. Wrap the pastry around the beef, brush with egg wash, and bake for 40-50 minutes.
Cook the macaroni according to package directions. Mix the lobster with cheddar and Parmesan cheese. Stir in the cooked macaroni and milk. Season with salt and pepper, and bake for 20-25 minutes.
Melt the butter in a saucepan. Add the sugar and cocoa powder, and mix well. Beat in the eggs and flour. Pour the mixture into a greased baking pan, and bake for 20-25 minutes.
